lead_paragraph: It is dangerous to assume that one player’s success against a team will mean that another can do the same, but after Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger managed four touchdown passes against a poor Browns defense, the expectations for the Bengals’ Carson Palmer went through the roof.
